channel.title: [PI] Spellbook teleports doesn't work
channel.description:
Hey!
When I'm clicking the "home" teleport in my spellbook nothing happens, none of the other teleports doesn't work either..
[i]Does anyone know whats wrong?[/i]

item.title: [PI] Spellbook teleports doesn't work
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Skrillex_Craft, post:9, topic:534340”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=653136.msg4376760#msg4376760 date=1382275498]
These are all my spell buttons:

75010 - Home teleport 4140 - Varrock teleport 4143 - Lumbridge teleport 4146 - Falador teleport 75008 - House teleport (not to be confused with home teleport) 4150 - Camelot teleport 6004 - Ardougne teleport 6005 - Watchtower teleport 29031 - Trollheim teleport 72038 - Ape atoll teleport
Hope this helps.
[/quote]isnt is suposed to be those coords (x,y,h)?[/quote]
Those are button IDs dude.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

[quote=“neroxx, post:6, topic:534340”]This is what happens when I’m clicking the different teleports in the modern spellbook…

[20.10.13 10:51]: [Login]: nero [20.10.13 10:51]: nero - actionbutton: 4171 [20.10.13 10:51]: nero - actionbutton: 4143 [20.10.13 10:51]: nero - actionbutton: 4143 [20.10.13 10:51]: nero - actionbutton: 4143 [20.10.13 10:51]: nero - actionbutton: 4143 [20.10.13 10:51]: nero - actionbutton: 4143[/quote]did u change only 1 tele button in the spell book??? you have to change the regular version ancients and lundar version… mostly 2 spell books il try to lookup the code of my teleports

item.title: [PI] Spellbook teleports doesn't work
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

[quote=“DAn0194, post:4, topic:534340”][quote author=Skrillex_Craft link=topic=653136.msg4376616#msg4376616 date=1382233659]
so loll you have to go to the place you want a teleport respawn like let us say you are in falador and want to go to lumbridge then you have to go to lumbridge and search a spawn point like let us say the lumbridge bank then type ::dataon or ::mypos then go to the place where you have to give in the coords of the teleport then try it by closing the client and running source compile then run both again then run to a place out of the coords then teleport to the place you have changed the coords of
[/quote]

What you said was so confusing and when you update the server you don’t need to close the client.

OT: Get the button id of the home teleport and in your ClickingButtons do something like this

case buttonid: teleportX = XCOORD OF WHERE YOU WANT TO GO teleportY = YCOORD OF WHERE YOU WANT TO GO break;[/quote]well atleast i was worth a try

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Spellbook teleports doesn't work
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Skrillex_Craft:

so loll you have to go to the place you want a teleport respawn like let us say you are in falador and want to go to lumbridge then you have to go to lumbridge and search a spawn point like let us say the lumbridge bank then type ::dataon or ::mypos then go to the place where you have to give in the coords of the teleport then try it by closing the client and running source compile then run both again then run to a place out of the coords then teleport to the place you have changed the coords of

What you said was so confusing and when you update the server you don’t need to close the client.

OT: Get the button id of the home teleport and in your ClickingButtons do something like this

case buttonid: teleportX = XCOORD OF WHERE YOU WANT TO GO teleportY = YCOORD OF WHERE YOU WANT TO GO break;

Read full topic
